subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mogi Mirim, a Brazilian club that has the former Barcelona star Rivaldo as its president, said it had hired Edson Cholbi do Nascimento, who was recently convicted in a money-laundering case.
snippet: Mogi Mirim, a Brazilian club that has the former Barcelona star Rivaldo as its president, said it had hired Edson Cholbi do Nascimento, who was recently convicted in a money-laundering case.
